Download

Click here to download the latest version (2.0).

Since version 2.0 you cannot restart the SMTP server within the app (closing the app will stop the server).
It is recommended to use the latest version, as it fixes various issues.
Version 1.13 is still available here for legacy purposes.

Get the sources

Source code available on GitHub.

git clone git@github.com:Nilhcem/FakeSMTP.git
